ygData.subject: Fw: [eqbards] Missing Songs...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I m new to the list so let me introduce myself. Danner Bramblethorn, WoodEld Bard, Songweaver, lifetaker, and heartbreaker. Known gigolo and
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone, I'm new to the list so let me introduce myself.

Danner Bramblethorn, WoodEld Bard, Songweaver, lifetaker, and heartbreaker. Known gigolo and Norrath's Most Eligible Bachelor. I can be found on the Tarrew Marr server.

Know, to answer a few questions that you've had.

Ken's Lubigrious Lament - ONLY found in Kelethin.

I also am missing the same songs as you all (30, 38, 39, 43-) but am organizing a Bard Information Network on Tarrew Marr and expect to get any and all questions ever asked by a Bard answered through our network.

As for travel, I am everywhere. I have visited most places in Norrath already and have even found a few places no one yet knows about (sorry, no spoilers ;). I urge you all to GET LOST. Seriously, just go somewhere you have no idea about. It's pretty much impossible to get stuck or caught anywhere without having forewarning first. That's what the CON is for. As far as entereing a new area and being worried about what level monsters are within, do a /WHOALL or something to find out information about the players in that zone. If they are all much higher levels than you, you should hightail it out of there. Selo's Accelerando was not created only for going from Point A to Point B faster than anything save the Gate Spell. It was also created for exploration. NO monster can catch up to even a 7th level Bard wailing on his hand drum. So get out there, explore, find new things. Another thing I have found is that Bard's are needed EVERYWHERE. I usually make about 10pp a day just from people hiring me to find their body. I have a constant rate for my services: (Any characters who con green to me I serve free of charge. Blue cons - 5gp, White - 8gp, Red - I start off at 1pp and work up depending on how much higher than me they are. This is a pretty fair system. Im not charging newbies, yet the more experienced players are getting a good deal being as they usually have ALOT of cash and loot on their corpses.

Well, I think that's about it for now. I look forward to hearing from you all soon.

--Danner Bramblethorn
